headings.usage: All page titles, section headers, and modal titles. DO NOT use Inter for headings.

data.usage: UNSPSC codes, Order IDs, SKU numbers, Pricing decimals.

glassmorphism.usage: Sticky headers, floating modals, toast notifications.

landing_page.description: Mix of Product Cards (small/medium) and Service Cards (large/tall). Services must be visually distinct and prominent.

orders_page.description: High information density. Use Shadcn Table. Row height 48px. Status badges pill-shaped.

ProductCard.style: White card, subtle border. Image top (aspect-video). Content bottom. Hover: Lift + Blue Border Glow.
elements: UNSPSC Code (JetBrains Mono, text-xs, text-slate-500, bg-slate-100, px-2, py-1, rounded)

ServiceCard.style: Distinct from ProductCard. Maybe dark bg or gradient bg option. Taller aspect ratio.

SponsoredTag.style: Absolute top-right of card. Amber background, dark amber text. Text: 'Sponsored'.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Add the new colors and fonts (Manrope, JetBrains Mono).
2. REFACTOR LANDING PAGE: Implement the Bento Grid layout. Mix Products and Services.
3. CREATE PRODUCT CARD: Must show UNSPSC Code and Category Name clearly.
4. CREATE PUNCHOUT MODAL: When 'Add to Cart' is clicked for PunchOut items, show this modal.
5. ENHANCE ORDERS PAGE: Add tabs for 'Orders', 'Quotations', 'RFQs'. Use dense tables.
6. ADD SPONSORED LOGIC: Randomly mark 10% of items as 'Sponsored' with the amber badge.
7. BRANDING: Ensure Infosys BPM logo is in the header.
8. SERVICES: Make them prominent. They are not second-class citizens.
universal_guidelines: Use 'Manrope' for all headings. It is the signature font.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all technical data (UNSPSC, IDs).
Cards must have a subtle border (slate-200) and a soft shadow.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
All interactive elements must have a hover state.
